creditline: Gift of the Committee on World Friendship Among Children (Federal Council of Churches - Rev. Sidney Gulick)
description: Doll with accessories showing regional dress of Miyazaki Province. This doll has been missing for decades. There continues to be inquiries made for the doll by several collectors and Japanese government officials. Storage areas have been searched several times, once in the presence of Japanese government representatives and the doll has not been found. A photograph of the doll has been sent to us and is in the registration dep't. object file for this accession number. To the best of our ability all of the records have been searched and no clues are left that may lead to the dolls whereabouts.  KK, 1999-02-17.
title: Miss Miyazaki
